title: Byron Bowers! (Comedian)
description: Joined this week by a Byron Bowers (@byronbowers) a Comedy Store regular by way of Atlanta along with a voice you should all be familiar with at this point Jon Klein (@jonathon_klein) of Automobile Magazine. Byron shares stories from his life in Atlanta, the comedy scene, his recent trip to Cuba and his affinity for german iron.  Meanwhile Jonathon does his usual thing and shares his experience in the Scarbo Performance SVF1.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
